attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For the following reasons:

Abuse of MP expenses and breaking the rules of The Green Book - 'Members
should avoid purchases which could be seen as extravagant or luxurious'.

Tax Evasion. Failure to pay Capital Gains Tax on the sale of her 2nd property which would have been left unpaid had it not be leaked by The Telegraph.

She has allowed maternity wards to close in Salford hospitals which means there will be no more Salfordians born which is tantamount to ethnic cleansing.

She's allowed investment to be poured in to the already lucrative parts of the city while other areas are desparate for assistance.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
